features.title: Server Management
features.description: Deploy and manage multiple game servers from a single interface.
features.longDescription: Start, stop, restart, and monitor resources in real-time. CPU, memory, and disk usage across all servers. One-click server creation with pre-configured game templates.

features.title: User System
features.description: Granular access control with admin controls and user roles.
features.longDescription: Admin controls, user roles, and server-level access management. Assign sub-users to specific servers with read-only or full access. Session-based authentication with CSRF protection.

features.title: Addon Architecture
features.description: Extend functionality without touching core code.
features.longDescription: Addons can add routes, database tables, UI components, and integrate external services. Full access to the panel API including the router, Prisma ORM, logger, and UI registration system.

features.title: Database Migrations
features.description: Addons handle their own database schema automatically.
features.longDescription: Define migrations in package.json and they run automatically when the addon is enabled. Applied migrations are tracked so they never run twice. Supports SQLite, MySQL, and PostgreSQL.

features.title: Modern Stack
features.description: TypeScript, Prisma, Express — standard tools, clean codebase.
features.longDescription: TypeScript gives type safety across the whole codebase. Prisma handles database queries with full type inference. Express keeps routing straightforward. Easy to understand for any Node.js developer.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Everything the panel does is accessible through the API.
features.longDescription: Build your own client interfaces, automate deployments, or integrate AirLink with external tools. All endpoints return consistent JSON with proper HTTP status codes.

addons.name: Modrinth Store
addons.author: g-flame
addons.description: Browse, search, and install Minecraft mods and modpacks from Modrinth directly inside your AirLink admin panel.
addons.longDescription: The Modrinth Store Addon integrates Modrinth directly into your AirLink panel. Browse, search, and install mods or modpacks from the admin panel with full feature control.
features: Browse and search Modrinth mod database
Admin panel integration with sidebar entry
addons.installNote: The Modrinth Store will appear in your AirLink admin panel after restarting.

addons.name: Parachute
addons.author: g-flame
addons.description: Google Drive integration for server backups. Upload, download, and restore server files with OAuth authentication.
addons.longDescription: Parachute integrates with Google Drive for server backups and file management. Handles OAuth authentication, token storage, and server-specific operations using server UUIDs.
features: Connect servers to Google Drive via OAuth
Upload and download server backup files
Restore backups with a single click
addons.installNote: You need a Google OAuth app — create one at console.cloud.google.com. Set APP_URL, GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID, and GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET in your panel .env before restarting.
